Table of Contents

Class AppStoredProgram

Namespace
Booseapp
Assembly
Booseapp.dll

Application-specific implementation of BOOSE.StoredProgram. Adds method support (register/call/return) and provides overrides for updating and retrieving application variable types (real/boolean) as well as expression evaluation cleanup.

public class AppStoredProgram : StoredProgram, IList, ICollection, IEnumerable, ICloneable, IStoredProgram

HasMethodReturn

Gets a value indicating whether the method return stack contains a pending return address.

public bool HasMethodReturn { get; }

Property Value

bool

Methods

EvaluateExpression(string)

Evaluates an expression and returns the result as a string. Performs light sanitisation of the expression and short-circuits evaluation for pure numeric values.

public override string EvaluateExpression(string expression)

Parameters

expression string

The expression to evaluate.

Returns

string

The evaluated result as a string.

GetMethod(string)

Retrieves a registered method by name.

public AppMethod GetMethod(string name)

Parameters

name string

The method name.

Returns

AppMethod

The registered AppMethod.

Exceptions

CommandException

Thrown when the method is not found.

GetVarValue(string)

Retrieves the current value of a variable as a string. Handles application real/boolean types and BOOSE real/boolean types. Returns "0" if the variable cannot be retrieved.

public override string GetVarValue(string varName)

Parameters

varName string

The variable name.

Returns

string

The variable value as a string.

PopMethodReturn()

Pops a return program counter from the method return stack.

public int PopMethodReturn()

Returns

int

The program counter value to return to.

Exceptions

CommandException

Thrown when the return stack is empty.

PushMethodReturn(int)

Pushes a return program counter onto the method return stack. This is used to return execution to the instruction after a call.

public void PushMethodReturn(int returnPc)

Parameters

returnPc int

The program counter value to return to.

RegisterMethod(AppMethod)

Registers a method definition so it can be located later by call. If a method with the same name already exists, it will be replaced.

public void RegisterMethod(AppMethod m)

Parameters

m AppMethod

The method definition to register.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown when m is null.

UpdateVariable(string, double)

Updates a variable with a real (double) value. Supports AppReal and BOOSE BOOSE.Real variables.

public override void UpdateVariable(string varName, double value)

Parameters

varName string

The variable name.

value double

The new double value.

Exceptions

CommandException

Thrown when the variable type is not compatible with a real value.

UpdateVariable(string, int)

Updates a variable with an integer value. Supports application and BOOSE boolean variables (stored as 0/1), otherwise falls back to base behaviour.

public override void UpdateVariable(string varName, int value)

Parameters

varName string

The variable name.

value int

The new integer value.
